newsitem.title: CANADA: Agnico-Eagle options land to Falconbridge.
newsitem.headline: Agnico-Eagle options land to Falconbridge.

text.p: Agnico-Eagle Mines Ltd said on Thursday it has entered into an option agreement with Falconbridge Ltd giving Falconbridge the right to explore for base metals on Agnico-Eagle's land in Cobalt, Ontario.
The property includes the historic silver mines of the Cobalt camp in Northern Ontario.
Falconbridge's exploration will focus on copper and zinc showings known to occur below the silver-cobalt veins.
Falconbridge can earn a 100 percent interest in the property by spending C$250,000 per year over seven years, Agnico Eagle said.

Agnico Eagle will retain a two percent net smelter return on any base metal production from the property. Agnico-Eagle also retains the right to explore for silver-cobalt vein type deposits on the property.
Exploration will start immediately, Agnico-Eagle said.
